description: Composite numbers n = prime(i_1) * ... * prime(i_k), prime(i_1) <= prime(i_2) <= ... <= prime(i_k), with at least one pair of successive prime factors (when sorted into monotonic order) where the latter prime factor is greater than the square of the former: prime(i_x)^2 < prime(i_{x+1}), for some x in 1 .. k-1, where k = A001222(n) and i_k = A061395(n).
